name: Poor Woman's Tiramisu
author: kkersten0
summary: I was craving coffee and chocolate one night and came up with this yummy version using graham crackers. Drizzle chocolate syrup over individual slices, if you like, for extra chocolate flavor.
directions: Beat heavy whipping cream with an electric mixer in a chilled bowl until soft peaks form
Beat confectioners' sugar, chocolate milk powder, and espresso powder into the whipped cream until the color is consistent and you again have soft peaks
Pour coffee into a wide, shallow bowl
Dip graham crackers briefly in the coffee and layer into the bottom of a loaf pan in a single layer to cover the bottom
Spread about 1/4 of the whipping cream mixture over the crackers
Repeat layering with remaining ingredients to get four layers each of the cream and the cookies
Cover loaf pan with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 2 hours
